titleStmt.title: To all the kings, princes, and governours in the whole world and all that profess themselves Christians, and others, to read and consider / by G. Fox.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
"This was upon me from the Lord to write unto you."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
